title: Meet Jonas Abrahamsen, the Norwegian ‘Plow’ Who Gained 20kg to Wear the Tour de France KoM Jersey
content:
'He doesn’t think much. He just races': The Uno-X Mobility 'snowplow' is on a mission to attack the Tour de France his own way.

Read the full article at Meet Jonas Abrahamsen, the Norwegian ‘Plow’ Who Gained 20kg to Wear the Tour de France KoM Jersey on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
